summary: Adds Chocobos in the world of Skyrim (Wild + Mounts + Followers + Summonable Mounts)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00]Version 2.4.4: Adds Winged Chocobos: Wild + Mounts + Followers + Summonable Mounts + a few Chocobos without wings but with saddle

Version 2.4.4 BIS: Alternative version with ONLY Winged Chocobos: Wild + Mounts + Followers + Summonable Mounts [/color]


[color=#00ff00][i] Optional files: Add-on "Music when mounting Chocobos" + Esp Version Française [/i][/color]


No DLC required

[img]https://i.imgur.com/T0jb9vy.gif[/img]

[b]5 Towns, 5 Breeds of Chocobos, 5 Colors [/b]

The Chocobos Mounts (60) are in the 5 Stables (Whiterun, Markath, Riften, Solitude, Windhelm) + IN the 5 Towns (only the Mounts with saddle); and around the towns...

The Followers Chocobos (14) are in the 5 Stables or near.

You can summon (9) Chocobos Mounts and -simple- Followers (the winged Chocobos) wherever you want.

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Chocobo" (Version 2.4)

The Wild Chocobos (369) are...in the world of Skyrim !


[i]In my other mod with the Chocobos you can summon the Black winged Chocobo with the music of the chocobos ! :[/i]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35436 ]Summon Blacks Mounts Chocobos with Music [/url]

[i]And my new mod "Incubated Chocobos" adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs of Chocobos with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde of baby Chocobos (5, 15, 50, 100 ...) that are following you as if you were their mother ! :[/i]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55520/?]Incubated Chocobos [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=933131chocobomountsandfollowers.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/933131chocobomountsandfollowers.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=2594665Montures.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/2594665Montures.jpg[/img][/url]

The Chocobos (of the 2 mods) are also in this video [color=#ff0000] Skyrim Mods 100 - The Best Mod of All Time ? [/color][color=#00ff00]from 1’31’’ to ->->->->->-> 4’05’’[/color]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]CM51NkYZ69M[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

And in this video [color=#ff0000]Lightning and Chocobos bring Final Fantasy to Skyrim Top 5 Skyrim Mods of the Week [/color] [color=#00ff00]from 11’ to ->->->->->->14’26’’[/color] (Mod 5)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]j5cd2a0GYpU[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[i] You have also the “old“ version 1.2.1 of this mod, the last version with the original model (from Nikitaa) for all chocobos (only without wings): wild + followers + mounts with/without saddle

If you prefer the chocobos without wings, you can download this and replace the .bsa and the .esp ![/i]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=194963ChocobosMountandFollower2.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/194963ChocobosMountandFollower2.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=350611chocobo4.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/350611chocobo4.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b]INSTALLATION and UNINSTALLATION [/b][/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) With « 7 – zip » -or other- (right click) you must unzip the downloaded file

2) You have a folder: “Data” (with 2 files: “ChocobosMounts.bsa” and “ChocobosMounts.esp”)

You have to put this folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

3) When you start the game, in "data files", you must check "ChocobosMounts.esp" at the bottom of the list to obtain the 10 books........OK.....play (Normally, this is done automatically !)

(Only if you have installed my other mods "Summon..."): You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX Chocobo and the “Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Chocobo” (versions 2.4) at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude).

Demonstration of the summonable chocobos in Dragonsreach from 3'24'' to ->->->->->-> 6’36’’

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]4NQA1kzvkoc[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

To uninstall, simply remove these files ! (if you have forgotten which files these are, simply unzip the folder of the mod again, and then find the same in Data).
[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=553825Chocobojaune.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/553825Chocobojaune.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][size="6"] [b]IMPORTANT [/b][/size][/color]

1) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the chocobo to “Go away”, etc… (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

2) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not.

3) If you have "lost" the “active” Mount, you can try a Fast Travel.

Normally, the “town’s mount’s" chocobos automatically returns IN the towns…If not !, you can walk or run (with the chocobo), dismount the chocobo, mount a horse or….and make a Fast Travel…
[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=795129Chocobos2.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/795129Chocobos2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] [size="6"] [b]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/b][/size][/color]

The Chocobo can’t jump, fly or swim…

To turn easily,it is better to walk ! ...

If you dismount in the water, it is possible to swim in the air !! Solution: MOUNT AGAIN or SPACEBAR

When the chocobo is in battle, it approaches the enemy and just stand their and lets itself be attacked and it doesn't fight back (there is no animation in the game for the chickens/chocobos to fight)

With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=974154ChocobosMountandFollower3.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/974154ChocobosMountandFollower3.jpg[/img][/url]
[color=#ff0000] [size="6"] [b]CREDITS and AUTHORIZATIONS [/b][/size][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5619180] Vie101010 [/url]for the mesh (Derivative work based on the original chocobo model in "Final Fantasy 10" of "Square Enix") and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3516810 ] messiasmummo[/url] for the texture of the Gold Chocobo

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3678570] Nikitaa [/url] for the meshes and textures of the 5 breeds of Chocobos (without wings)

Free sounds for the followers

Un remerciement particulier à [color=#ff0000] Gerauld[/color] de la [url=http://confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/index.php ]Confrérie des Traducteurs [/url], qui m'a permis de résoudre 2 problèmes épineux dans le modèle de base des Chocobos ailés (Une brillance excessive et une absence d'ombre) en m'aiguillant dans l'utilisation du logiciel[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope] Nifskope[/url] !
[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=772347Wildchocobosbleus2.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/772347Wildchocobosbleus2.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=415746Wildchocobosbleus.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/415746Wildchocobosbleus.jpg[/img][/url]
If you want the [color=#ff0000]Music of the Chocobos[/color] when you mount...

1) You can add my "Add-on" to this mod: "Music when mounting Chocobos", but there is a "little" problem: the chocobos AND the horses have the same music...!

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IEUfyd7rC-w] Final Fantasy - Chocobo theme Orchestra [/url]

[url=https://soundcloud.com/blaketothefuture/final-fantasy-chocobo-theme] Chocobo theme orchestra [/url] by [url=https://soundcloud.com/blaketothefuture]Blake Robinson[/url] ("Feel free to download and share my music but please don't use it in commercial situations without my permission")

2) You can download on the nexus my other mod with the Chocobos:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35436] Summon Blacks Mounts Chocobos with Music [/url]

(with the Black winged Chocobo)

3) Or you can try this mod (I have try, it works perfectly, but with the same problem):

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28709] Music when mounting [/url] by Bagserk (Not to have "File not valid" when you convert the mp3 to XWM file with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3159 ] MultiXwm by Vikichan [/url]; you must put your mp3 in C/Program files)


For the fun:

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?hl=fr&gl=FR&v=d81qFaoe010] Cockatiel sings Theme of Chocobo [/url]
